23-016SC.summary: Recommendation to approve the minutes of the Sustainable City Commission meeting of Thursday, June 22, 2023.Commissioner Dillon spoke.Page 1 of 6411 W. OCEAN BOULEVARDCIVIC CHAMBERS, 4:00 PMTHURSDAY, AUGUST 24, 2023CITY OF LONG BEACHSUSTAINABLE CITY COMMISSION MINUTESMeredith Reynolds, Deputy City Manager, spoke.Fern Nueno, Climate Manager, City Manager Department, spoke.Vice Chair Skye spoke.Commissioner Bergeron-Birge spoke.A dialogue ensued between Vice Chair Skye and Commissioner Bergeron-Birge.A motion was made by Commissioner Bergeron-Birge, seconded by Vice Chair Skye, to approve recommendation, as amended, to modify the minutes of the Sustainable City Commission meeting of Thursday, June 22, 2023 to reflect the point when Dave Shukla spoke at the 2:07:55 time mark.  The motion carried by the following vote:Yes: 7 - Donna Bergeron-Birge, Sona Coffee, Carla Dillon, Keisha Gaines, Rey Gonzales, Coby Skye and Hilda GaytanAbsent: 3 - Kirk Kunihiro, Alan Tolkoff and Morgan Wheeler2.
